ResearchProjectDef.label: Hypertech Fabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the crafting of Hypertech Components and many of the basic items and equipment crafted using them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Light Installations
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks access to a number of automated installations, making life on the Rim a little easier.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medium Installations
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the building of larger and more efficient installations.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy Installations
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the building of the biggest and most efficient installations.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Light Turrets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks access to a number of turrets, they will typically also require a factions weapons to be unlocked to be buildable.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medium Turrets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks access to a number of turrets, they will typically also require a factions weapons to be unlocked to be buildable.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heavy Turrets
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks access to a number of turrets, they will typically also require a factions weapons to be unlocked to be buildable.

ResearchProjectDef.label: blastersmithing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to craft blasters of various design, ranged weapons capable of spitting out superheated plasma, causing severe burns on a lightly armoured or unprotected target. Heat based weapons are not very useful against typical mechanoids, however Ion based blasters are highly effective against mechanoids as well as droids.

ResearchProjectDef.label: heavy weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advance your knowledge of hypertech weapons beyond simple blasters, narrowing the plasma shot to be more damaging for long range snipers, decreasing plasma heat to allow much more rapidfire weapons, or moving away from blasters altogether to create flamethrowers and rocket launchers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: armoursmithing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to craft a variety of armours, from padded leatherwork to top of the line military gear. Whatever your need, there's likely to be an option covering you.

ResearchProjectDef.label: heavy armour
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advance your knowledge of hypertech personal defence techology, learn techniques that allow crafting heavy armour that minimizes movement restriction.

ResearchProjectDef.label: explosives
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create advanced explosives, in forms for throwing towards groups of enemies or as a defensive measure with motion sensors to make mines.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tech belts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to craft a variety of equipment belts, allowing sound dampening, temperature regulation or even pain control.

ResearchProjectDef.label: stim belts
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to craft a variety of stim belts, providing options for slowing bleeding if wounded, increased adrenaline for faster running, or providing a higher pain tolerance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: vambraces
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks crafting of a variety of vambrace equipment.
